WGY: Sanders 68% | Clinton 12% A Focus Group is a form of scientific qualitative research that gathers undecided or uncommitted voters for the purpose of evaluating the candidates' performance in the debates. Three focus groups evaluated Tuesday night¡¯s democratic debate; and three focus groups declared Sanders the victor. 1. Frank Luntz Focus Group: ¡°The participants agreed overwhelmingly that Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders was the big winner at the first Democratic debate.¡± 2. Fusion Focus Group: ¡°Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders was the most popular candidate among a group of young registered Democrats responding to Tuesday¡¯s Democratic presidential debate in Las Vegas. The panel voted 8 to 3 for Sanders against the runner-up Hillary Clinton, with one panelist saying it was a tie between the two.¡± 3. Focus Group: ¡°Majority of Focus Group Think Sanders Won First Debate¡± Many sources have recognized Sanders as the clear victor ¡°Bernie Sanders won a major victory in Tuesday night¡¯s first Democratic debate, according to polls, focus groups, media experts, independent analysts and social media analytics.¡± DAILYKOS ¡°Bernie Sanders' night: Authenticity wins the Democratic debate.¡± -- Chicago Tribune editorial ¡°This was Bernie Sanders¡¯ night: The candidate of anger and honesty won the Democratic debate.¡± -- Salon¡¯s Colin McEnroe ¡°Bernie Sanders Clearly Won The Democratic Debate -- On Twitter.¡± -- Forbes ¡°On social media there were more Google searches for Sanders than for any other candidate.¡± ¡°He was the most retweeted candidate of the night"""" -- Twitter.¡± ¡°He gained more followers on Twitter than any other candidate and Twitter said people talked about Sanders more than any other candidate online.¡± """"Sanders had the """"biggest social moment¡± of the debate.¡± -- Facebook ¡°Bernie Sanders raised 1.3 million dollars in the four hours after the debate.¡± ¡°Google analytics demonstrated a snapshot of nation-wide reaction; Senator Bernie Sanders seems to have won the debate.¡±
